channel.title: [Crash] Generator in Blast Pit
channel.description: The game crashes for me every time I start the generator. The gennerator will start, I will head up the elevator, then the music will stutter and the game will lock up the moment the fan starts to speed up. I would guess its beacsue of all the physics interactions that start then, but I am not sure. Edit: I've now tried it first destroying the crate in the blades, then with all the visual setting set to low, and I recieved the same crash both times. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T20_36_4C0.mdmp (91 KB)
